synopsis.text: Mikleo, a seraphim, and Sorey, a young human, share an uncommon bond as Sorey was raised in the realm of spiritual beings, invisible to the human eye. Inspired by ancient lore, Sorey aspires to uncover the lost connection between humans and seraphim, envisioning a harmonious coexistence. His life takes a dramatic turn during his maiden visit to the human capital, where he inadvertently draws a sacred sword from stone, revealing his destiny as the Shepherd, a fabled hero tasked with warding off calamity. As the weight of his mission sets in, Sorey and his companions embark on a transformative journey, confronting the malevolent Lord of Calamity and striving to realize their dream of unity between the two worlds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
